      • Record

        protected Record(java.lang.String userID)
        Constructor with userID only Primary key constructor for User recores
        Parameters:
        userID - String the record's UserId (primary key for User, foreign key and part of primary key for all others)

      • Record

        protected Record(java.lang.String userID,
      java.lang.String recordID)
        Primary key String constructor (should not be used for User records)
        Parameters:
        userID - String the record's UserId (primary key for User, foreign key and part of primary key for all others)
        recordID - String the other part of the record's primary key for all except user

      • Record

        protected Record(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> values)
        ArrayList constructor
        Parameters:
        values - ArrayList list of the values of the attributes, in order (doesn't need to incldue all attributes)
